entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon except gusting to 60 near thunderstorms. High 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 10 September 2016
